flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=29>>29 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 29 bags = <<48-29=19>>19 bags for $22 each
19 bags were sold for 19 bags x $22/bag = $<<19*22=418>>418
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $418 = $<<306+250+418=974>>974
The salesman made $974 - $576 = $<<974-576=398>>398 in profit.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 29. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
